sentence.text: Have you just made a new film, Miss Marsh?
sentence.textCn: 您刚拍完一部新电影吗，马什小姐？

sentence.text: Are you going to make another?
I don't want to make another film for a long time.
sentence.textCn: 我早就不想再拍片子了。
由本报记者艾伦·琼斯报道。

sentence.text: Karen Marsh arrived at London Airport today.
sentence.textCn: 卡伦·马什今天到达伦敦机场。

sentence.text: She was wearing a blue dress and a mink coat.
sentence.textCn: 她穿着一身蓝色的套装和一件貂皮大衣。

sentence.text: She told me she had just made a new film.
sentence.textCn: 她告诉我她刚拍完一部新片子。

sentence.text: She said she was not going to make another.
sentence.textCn: 她说她不准备再拍电影了。

sentence.text: She said she was going to retire.
She told reporters she felt very tired and didn't want to make another film for a long time.'
sentence.textCn: 她告诉记者她感到很疲劳，早就不想再拍电影了。”
